messages.title: Re-elect Catherine McKinnell as Newcastle North’s Labour MP
messages.content: Catherine McKinnell has been your local MP since 2010, she’s determined to get the results Newcastle needs in these uncertain times. Catherine doesn’t just talk about making a difference. She gets on and does it.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fighting for our NHS and social care services
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Catherine pledges to fight for our NHS trust, striving for better health and social care.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Standing up for our children and young people
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Catherine aims to protect education funding from Tory cuts.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protecting education funding from Tory cuts
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Catherine aims to protect education funding from Tory cuts.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Striving for a fairer economy that works for everyone
keyPolicies.policyDescription: She is committed to working for a fairer economy.

issues.education: Catherine aims to protect education funding from Tory cuts.
issues.health: Catherine pledges to fight for our NHS trust, striving for better health and social care.

leaflet.personalStatement: It’s been a huge privilege to serve as the MP for Newcastle North since 2010.

images.caption: Re-elect Catherine McKinnell as Newcastle North’s Labour MP

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet prominently features Labour's color and branding, includes a personal statement and pledges from the candidate, and notes the Tory failure as a counterpoint to her policies.
